mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE device_id = #{deviceId} AND deleted_flag = 0 ORDER BY snapshot_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE snapshot_time >= #{time} AND deleted_flag = 0 ORDER BY snapshot_time ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE score_value < #{threshold} AND deleted_flag = 0 AND snapshot_time = ( SELECT MAX(snapshot_time) FROM t_device_health_snapshot s2 WHERE s2.device_id = t_device_health_snapshot.device_id AND s2.deleted_flag = 0 )

SELECT CASE WHEN score_value >= 85 THEN 'healthy' WHEN score_value >= 60 THEN 'warning' ELSE 'critical' END as health_level, COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as device_count, ROUND(AVG(score_value), 2) as avg_score, MIN(score_value) as min_score, MAX(score_value) as max_score FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE deleted_flag = 0 AND snapshot_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND snapshot_time = ( SELECT MAX(snapshot_time) FROM t_device_health_snapshot s2 WHERE s2.device_id = t_device_health_snapshot.device_id AND s2.deleted_flag = 0 AND s2.snapshot_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) GROUP BY CASE WHEN score_value >= 85 THEN 'healthy' WHEN score_value >= 60 THEN 'warning' ELSE 'critical' END ORDER BY min_score DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_device_health_snapshot SET deleted_flag = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE snapshot_time < #{time} AND deleted_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT level_code, CASE WHEN level_code = 'healthy' THEN '健康' WHEN level_code = 'warning' THEN '警告' WHEN level_code = 'critical' THEN '危险' ELSE '未知' END as level_description, COUNT(*) as device_count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE deleted_flag = 0 AND snapshot_time = ( SELECT MAX(snapshot_time) FROM t_device_health_snapshot s2 WHERE s2.device_id = t_device_health_snapshot.device_id AND s2.deleted_flag = 0 )), 2) as percentage FROM t_device_health_snapshot WHERE deleted_flag = 0 AND snapshot_time = ( SELECT MAX(snapshot_time) FROM t_device_health_snapshot s2 WHERE s2.device_id = t_device_health_snapshot.device_id AND s2.deleted_flag = 0 ) GROUP BY level_code ORDER BY CASE level_code WHEN 'healthy' THEN 1 WHEN 'warning' THEN 2 WHEN 'critical' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END
